name: midgard-node
description: A CLI application for submitting/receiving L2 transactions and committing/merging Midgard blocks

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --minify --format esm && tsup src/workers/* --minify --format esm
scripts.listen: pnpm run build && node dist/index.js listen
scripts.init: pnpm run build && node dist/index.js init
scripts.bench:codec: export NODE_ENV='emulator' && export BENCH_QUICK=1 && vitest run --config vitest.bench.config.ts tests/benchmarks/midgard-tx-codec.bench.ts --disable-console-intercept
scripts.bench:codec:quick: export NODE_ENV='emulator' && export BENCH_QUICK=1 && vitest run --config vitest.bench.config.ts tests/benchmarks/midgard-tx-codec.bench.ts --disable-console-intercept
scripts.bench:phase-a:native: export NODE_ENV='emulator' && export BENCH_QUICK=1 && vitest run --config vitest.bench.config.ts tests/benchmarks/native-phase-a.bench.ts --disable-console-intercept
scripts.bench:phase-a:native:quick: export NODE_ENV='emulator' && export BENCH_QUICK=1 && vitest run --config vitest.bench.config.ts tests/benchmarks/native-phase-a.bench.ts --disable-console-intercept
scripts.bench:phase-a:native:full: export NODE_ENV='emulator' && vitest run --config vitest.bench.config.ts tests/benchmarks/native-phase-a.bench.ts --disable-console-intercept
scripts.bench:validation: export NODE_ENV='emulator' && export BENCH_QUICK=1 && vitest run --config vitest.bench.config.ts tests/benchmarks/validation-benchmark.bench.ts --disable-console-intercept
scripts.bench:validation:quick: export NODE_ENV='emulator' && export BENCH_QUICK=1 && vitest run --config vitest.bench.config.ts tests/benchmarks/validation-benchmark.bench.ts --disable-console-intercept
